headline: BRITAIN BACKS PRESIDENT IN NOTE TO RUSSIA; Says She Approves Principles Laid Dawn in His Historic Message to Congress. WAR NOT ONE OF CONQUEST Rejoices Russia Has Announced Intention of Rescuing Poles from Germany. WISHES HER GODSPEED Expresses Readiness to Examine, and If Need Be, Revise Treaties Made with Allies. FRENCH APPROVE NOTE. Say It Shows the World Must Unite to Vanish Autocracy. LAUDS PRESIDENT'S NOTE. British Paper Calls It Powerful Piece of Analysis. BACKS PRESIDENT IN NOTE TO RUSSIA British Note Pleases Washington. NOTE STARTLES GERMANS. Newspapers Await Instructions Before Commenting on It. GORKY ASSAILS ALLIES. Says It Is Useless Further to Parley with Them.
